letsEncrypt_instance: Use this instance for automatic update

tooltip_auth: Check login and password be access to the admin page. You can manage it on the users tab.
tooltip_bind: IP address, where the admin will run
tooltip_certChained: Chained certificate. Root certificate + Public certificate. Please manage it in the system configs.
tooltip_certPrivate: Private certificate. Please manage it in the system configs.
tooltip_certPublic: Public certificate. Please manage it in the system configs.
tooltip_lePort: Port for challenge server. Let's Encrypt support only port 80, but with router you can use any port.
tooltip_leUpdate: This instance will update Let's Encrypt certificates every 3 months.
tooltip_port: Port for admin interface. It must be available. If running on linux with no root you cannot use ports below 1000.
tooltip_secure: Enable SSL protocol. Admin will be available via https:// and not http://
tooltip_ttl: Login timeout. After this time the user will be automatically logger off.
